name: Jetpack Jump
summary:
Fly high in Jetpack Jump to reach new places waiting to be discovered!

Tap to Jump on the mark and soar into the sky, make sure you use all your jetpack fuel to go the distance.

Upgrade your jetpack and your running speed to be able to travel further than before and beat your high score.

The further you travel the more money you get!

How far will you get?
